LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodfocus.label: кровава зосоредженість
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodfocus.description: By forcibly manipulating the body’s stores of hemogen, the caster can enter a state of rapid meditation, regaining psyfocus at the cost of hemogen.
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodShard.label: кровавий осколок
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodShard.description: Launch a small amount of excess blood as a lethal projectile by forcibly expelling hemogen that has been solidified into a crystalline structure.
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodSpew.label: кровавий плювок
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodSpew.description: Spew forth a fine mist of hemogen towards the targets, coating them in sticky, nauseating blood. Those affected are overcome with intense vomiting.
LanguageData.VPEH_CloseWounds.label: закрита рана
LanguageData.VPEH_CloseWounds.description: Примусово перемістити надлишок крові, щоб зупинити кровотечу.
LanguageData.VPEH_Hemodrain.label: висмоктування
LanguageData.VPEH_Hemodrain.description: Дистанційно витягує кров цілі та перетворює її на гемоген. Практично, але не ефективно.
LanguageData.VPEH_CorpseExplosion.label: трупний вибух
LanguageData.VPEH_CorpseExplosion.description: Використайте гемоген заклинателя, щоб викликати вибух трупа, який не завдає шкоди, але створює щільний туман крові, який викликає сильну блювоту.
LanguageData.VPEH_WordofOffering.label: word of offering
LanguageData.VPEH_WordofOffering.description: Convinces the target to offer their blood to the caster. Can be used on visitors or even during combat.
LanguageData.VPEH_SanguineSpear.label: sanguine spear
LanguageData.VPEH_SanguineSpear.description: Launches a pressurized spear of blood over to the target, damaging the target and creating a bloodmist explosion. Damage depends on the caster's hemogen level.
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodRite.label: blood rite
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodRite.description: Creates a mote of hemogen that follows the caster, acting as an amplifier for psychic sensitivity based on the caster’s current hemogen level.
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodstorm.label: bloodstorm
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodstorm.description: Creates a downpour of blood, inflicting non-hemogenic individuals with bloodmist, causing intense vomiting. Sanguophages instead regenerate hemogen, and don’t gain psychic heat when casting any psycasts under the effects of bloodstorm.
